snippet.title: Black State - Official Reveal Trailer (Metal Gear Meets Portal?)
snippet.description: Developer Motion Blur has announced Black State, a visually stunning new third-person action-adventure for PC that, if this gorgeous announcement trailer is accurate, mixes the espionage action of Metal Gear Solid with the reality-bending portal tech of Portal. It's powered by Unreal Engine 5.
